creator: tlane@macromedia.com
text:
The "upper" character class doesn't match lowercase chars when the 
Perl5Compiler CASE_INSENSITIVE_MASK is on. It should. Interstingly, "[A-Z]" 
does match lowercase under these conditions.

creator: dfs@apache.org
text:
Another unicode patch bug.

As an interim fix, added a flag to alter behavior of [[:upper:]] during
case insensitive matches.  The real fix will come later as part of the
improved case-folding on the TODO list.
Closing since a release including the fix was made.
creator: dfs@apache.org
